attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The loss of personal data on such a massive scale should result in the Government facing criminal charges for failing to follow basic security procedures. Any individual who suffers either a direct or indirect financial loss must be reimbursed directly by the Government.

reasons: Potentially libellous, false, or defamatory statements
